name: console-commando
description: A tool for creating console commands

scripts.build:dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run clean && npm run rollup
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production npm run rollup
scripts.docs: rm -rf docs && typedoc --out docs src && mkdir -p versions/`npm run --silent version` && cp -r docs/* $_ && mv versions docs
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build:prod
scripts.release:prerelease: npm run build:prod && npm run test && npm version prerelease && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run build:prod && npm run test && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release: npm run build:prod && npm run test && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags

author: Lucas Caro <lucascaro@gmail.com>
